entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 p.m. CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or snow this evening. Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
